biz.paluch.spinach.api

Interface DisqueConnection<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - Key type.
    V - Value type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, com.lambdaworks.redis.api.StatefulConnection<K,V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DisqueConnectionImpl

    public interface DisqueConnection<K,V>
extends com.lambdaworks.redis.api.StatefulConnection<K,V>
    A thread-safe connection to a redis server. Multiple threads may share one DisqueConnection. A ConnectionWatchdog monitors each connection and reconnects automatically until StatefulConnection.close() is called. All pending commands will be (re)sent after successful reconnection.
    Author:
    Mark Paluch

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DisqueAsyncCommands<K,V> async()
      Returns the DisqueAsyncCommands API for the current connection.
      DisqueReactiveCommands<K,V> reactive()
      Returns the DisqueReactiveCommands API for the current connection.
      DisqueCommands<K,V> sync()
      Returns the DisqueCommands API for the current connection.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.lambdaworks.redis.api.StatefulConnection

        close, dispatch, flushCommands, getOptions, getTimeout, getTimeoutUnit, isOpen, reset, setAutoFlushCommands, setTimeout

    • Method Detail

      • sync

        DisqueCommands<K,V> sync()
        Returns the DisqueCommands API for the current connection. Does not create a new connection.
        Returns:
        the synchronous API for the underlying connection.

      • async

        DisqueAsyncCommands<K,V> async()
        Returns the DisqueAsyncCommands API for the current connection. Does not create a new connection.
        Returns:
        the asynchronous API for the underlying connection.

      • reactive

        DisqueReactiveCommands<K,V> reactive()
        Returns the DisqueReactiveCommands API for the current connection. Does not create a new connection.
        Returns:
        the reactive API for the underlying connection.
